title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is for the server to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue: 
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip 
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed 
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat 7 instance
